title: SEO20.dev - Technical SEO Report
description: Get your technical SEO report in less than 24 hours.

checkout.title: Review and Pay for your Technical SEO Report
checkout.metaDescription: Review and pay for your technical SEO report. Secure payment with Webpay Plus or Mercado Pago. Receive your report in less than 24h.

form.name: Name
form.websiteInvalid: Please enter a valid URL (e.g., https://yoursite.com).

includes.title: What's included in this SEO report?
items: Technical analysis with Lighthouse and Core Web Vitals
Title, metadata, and HTML structure evaluation
Sitemap review and key elements for Google

doubts.title: Questions before paying?
doubts.description: If you have questions about the report, you can contact us before completing the payment.

checkout.security: Your data is protected. Payment is processed through secure platforms like Webpay Plus and Mercado Pago.
checkout.delivery: You will receive your technical SEO report in less than 24 business hours directly to your email.

errors.webpay: There was an error generating the payment. Check the console for details.

confirmation.title: Payment Confirmation
confirmation.metaDescription: Status of your payment and confirmation of your technical SEO report.

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.message: Your payment has been processed successfully. You will receive your technical SEO report in less than 24 business hours.

pending.title: Payment in Process
pending.message: Your payment is being processed. We will notify you when it's confirmed.

error.title: Payment Error
error.message: There was a problem processing your payment. Please try again or contact support.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.message: The waiting time to confirm the payment has expired. Please verify your payment status or contact support.
